## Load packages

```{r}
#| label: load_packages
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(sf)
library(deldir)
library(reticulate)

```

## Display random voronoi polygons

```{r}
#| label: voronoi_polygons

set.seed(1967)
x <- rnorm(20, 0, 1.5)
y <- rnorm(20, 0, 1)
plot(x, y, type="n", asp=1)
points(x, y, pch=20, col="red", cex=1)
vtess <- deldir::deldir(x, y)
plot(vtess, wlines="tess", labelPts=FALSE, add=TRUE, lty=1)

```

```{python}

for i in range(10):
  print(i)

```
